ygData.subject: Re: red peoples
ygData.msgSnippet: How did you know who to give the book to if you didn t read it? Also, there is a way to switch from Red to Green, you just have to find that one out tho ;)
ygData.messageBody:
How did you know who to give the book to if you didn't read it? Also, there is a way to switch from Red to Green, you just have to find that one out tho ;)

enigma wrote:

> From: enigma <enigma@...>
>
> Do you all agree with the red pvp stuff? i dont, when i was just starting i gave the book to the priest *before i knew how to read it because wheni played the demo i couldn't figure it out either* and am red, and as of last night i found out another thing that will suck in the future, and i dont want to start another character because im already a level 9 necromancer, noone can cure diseases or heal me unless they are red too... this seems like overkill to me and verant needs to change some things.
>
> Naelie
